tool_description: Searches and retrieves multiple translations of the same scriptural passage from various versions and denominations.

max_results.description: Maximum number of translations to return (1-50)

error_messages: Invalid scripture reference: Provide a valid biblical reference format.
Translation not found: One or more specified translation names are not available.
Unsupported language: Requested language is not available in the database.
Invalid year range: publication_year_min must be <= publication_year_max.
Max results out of range: max_results must be between 1 and 50.
No results found: No translations match the specified criteria.
usage: Provide a scripture reference and optionally filter by translation names, languages, denominations, or publication years. Returns multiple translation versions of the same passage.

reference.description: The scripture reference that was queried

translation_names.description: Names of the translation versions returned
